bleeding.title: Severe Bleeding
bleeding._comments: keywords will be used in STT
steps: Person ko baithaayein ya litaayein
Saaf kapde se zor se dabav banayein
Zakhm ke upar haath na uthayein
Khoon behna kam hone tak dabav rakhein

burns.title: Burns
steps: Jali hui jagah ko thande paani ke neeche rakhein
10â€“15 minute tak thanda karein
Saaf kapde se dheere se dhakein
redFlags: Skin jal kar kaali ho rahi hai

choking.title: Choking
steps: Person ko aage jhukaayein
Peeche se 5 back blows dein
Agar zarurat ho to 5 abdominal thrusts karein (Heimlich maneuver)
doNot: Haath ya objects ko zakhm ke andar na daalein

fracture.title: Fracture
steps: Affected limb ko move na karein
Saaf kapde ya splint se immobilize karein
Person ko aram se bithaayein ya litaayein
redFlags: Haddi skin se bahar aa rahi hai
doNot: Haddi ko forcibly set na karein
Zakhm par direct pressure na dalein

snake_bite.title: Snake Bite
steps: Person ko calm aur still rakhein
Affected area ko dil se neeche rakhein
Zakhm ke upar tight band na lagayein
doNot: Zakhm ko kaatne ki koshish na karein

electric_shock.title: Electric Shock
steps: Power source ko turant band karein
Person ko touch karne se pehle ensure karein ki current band ho
Person ko flat surface par litaayein aur breathing check karein
doNot: Person ko current ke saath touch na karein
Paani me litaane ki koshish na karein

heat_stroke.title: Heat Stroke
steps: Person ko shady aur thandi jagah par le jaayein
Kapdon ko dheere se loose karein
Thande paani ya wet cloth se body ko cool karein
doNot: Person ko zyada water force na karein
Ice packs directly skin par na lagayein

unconscious.title: Unconsciousness
steps: Person ko safe position me litaayein (recovery position)
Breathing aur pulse check karein
Agar na saans le raha ho to CPR shuru karein
doNot: Khane ya paani dene ki koshish na karein

heart_attack.title: Heart Attack
steps: Person ko aram se baithaayein ya litaayein
Tight kapde dheere se loose karein
Agar available ho to aspirin chabane ko dein
redFlags: Left haath, jaw ya chest me pain

stroke.title: Stroke
steps: Person ko flat surface par litaayein
Sir ko thoda side me rakhein
Bolne aur haath pair movement check karein

breathing_difficulty.title: Breathing Difficulty / Asthma
steps: Person ko seedha baithaayein
Tight kapde loose karein
Inhaler available ho to use karwayein
doNot: Person ko litaane ki koshish na karein

poisoning.title: Poisoning
steps: Person ko shaant rakhein
Poison ka container ya naam yaad rakhein
Turant medical help bulayein

head_injury.title: Head Injury
steps: Person ko still rakhein
Bleeding ho to dheere se pressure lagayein
Person ko observe karein
doNot: Sir ko zor se move na karein

allergic_reaction.title: Allergic Reaction
steps: Allergen se person ko door karein
Person ko comfortable position me rakhein
Agar injection (EpiPen) ho to use karein

child_emergency.title: Child Emergency
steps: Child ko calm aur safe rakhein
Breathing aur response check karein
Guardian ya medical help ko bulayein

fever_seizure.title: High Fever / Seizure
steps: Person ko side me litaayein
Sharp objects door rakhein
Seizure khatam hone ka wait karein
doNot: Person ko pakad ke na rakhein

hypothermia.title: Hypothermia
steps: Person ko dry aur warm jagah le jaayein
Geelay kapde hataayein
Blanket se dheere dheere garam karein
